mapper.sql: id, applyDataId, verifyId, readyDoctorCode, readyDoctorName, readyDksId, readyDksName, changeDoctorCode, changeDoctorName, changeDksId, changeDksName, operateReason, operateDate, refuseId, refuseName, refuseReason, refuseDate, adminPersonId, adminPersonName, adminChangeDate, adminReason, STATE, enableDate, operateProcess, approvalState, applyDateStr, orderNum, areaType, dataType, readyFyid, changeFyid
mapper.select: SELECT yb_chs_manage.* FROM yb_chs_manage INNER JOIN yb_chs_apply_data ON yb_chs_manage.applyDataId = yb_chs_apply_data.id WHERE yb_chs_apply_data.pid= #{pid} and yb_chs_manage.applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} AND yb_chs_manage.areaType = #{areaType} AND yb_chs_manage.state in(0,1,2);

SELECT yb_chs_manage.* FROM yb_chs_manage INNER JOIN yb_chs_apply_data ON yb_chs_manage.applyDataId = yb_chs_apply_data.id WHERE yb_chs_apply_data.pid = #{pid} AND yb_chs_manage.applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} AND yb_chs_manage.areaType = #{areaType} AND yb_chs_manage.state = 0 AND yb_chs_manage.enableDate <= STR_TO_DATE( #{enableDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' )
